home.title: Michael Grandinetti
home.description: Providing quality bookkeeping, consulting and accounting services to US and International companies. Over 40 years of experience in Asia Pacific and the USA.  I am Quickbooks certified.  I have provided services to companies in the USA, Singapore, Philippines, Indonesia, Thailand, Cambodia and Timor Leste.
